rules_text:
Ancient Confluence enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W} or {U}. Put a storage counter on Ancient Confluence.
{T}, Remove a storage counter from Ancient Confluence and sacrifice it: Add two mana in any combination of colors.
notes:
2k17
(T: Add M to your mana pool.)
CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.
Sacrifice CARDNAME: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. > CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.
T: Add M or M to your mana pool. Put a storage counter on CARDNAME.
T, Remove a storage counter from CARDNAME and sacrifice it: Add two mana in any combination of colors to your mana pool.
